IndexTotalFieldsLimit.title: Maximum number of fields in index
IndexTotalFieldsLimit.description: Specify the maximum number of fields that can be included in an index. Exceeding this limit can result in performance issues. For more details, refer to the Elasticsearch documentation: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/mapping.html#mapping-limit-settings

TokenFilter.title: Token filter
TokenFilter.description: Choose the token filter to apply when indexing searchable fields. This requires rebuilding the index

MinGram.title: Minimum gram length
MinGram.description: The minimum number of characters in a gram. This requires rebuilding the index

MaxGram.title: Maximum gram length
MaxGram.description: The maximum number of characters in a gram. This requires rebuilding the index

DeleteDuplicateIndexes.title: Deleting duplicate active indexes
DeleteDuplicateIndexes.description: Search and delete duplicate active indexes before Delete and build operation
